architectural_resources: Containerized web application (Flask) listening on port 8080 (Dockerfile EXPOSE 8080; gunicorn bind 0.0.0.0:8080)
HCP Waypoint project/app definitions for build+deploy (waypoint.hcl)
Container image registry credentials/target image (waypoint.hcl variables REGISTRY_USERNAME/REGISTRY_PASSWORD/REGISTRY_IMAGENAME)
Local Docker deployment target for dev (waypoint.hcl app "dev" deploy use "docker")
AWS ECS service deployment target (waypoint.hcl app "ecs" deploy use "aws-ecs" with region var.aws_region, memory=512)
Runtime configuration via environment variable PLATFORM (app/app.py reads PLATFORM; waypoint.hcl sets static_environment PLATFORM for each deploy target)
